channel.title: Blogs on Kiran Arun
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Kiran Arun

item.title: Why I Do This
item.description: Why I left school (aged 15, UK Year 10) My time and mental energy were being used unproductively The GCSE system forced me to work towards achieving a high-average I aspire to achieve great things but structured mass schooling will erode my competitiveness and demotivate me I don’t mind failing, because it gains you a visible, quantifiable error from which to learn Why I learn ML It’s the future and it’s cutting-edge I enjoy the construction of a project/system (of models, maths and computational systems) Potential to make a big positive contribution to the nation of Earth.
